explains: adj. 强制性的，义务的；受（前国际联盟）委任统治的
wordGroup: mandatory standard n. 强制性标准，法定标准；推荐性标准
mandatory provident fund 强制性公积金
mandatory requirement 强制性要求；必须遵循的要求

sentences.en: He was married, and that was mandatory.
sentences.cn: 他结婚了，这是强制性的。

sentences.en: I think that mandatory voting is a no-braine and dumb idea.
sentences.cn: 我认为强制投票这事是一个无脑的，极其愚蠢的想法。

sentences.en: An effective and mandatory program sponsored by the high school is the only solution to this serious problem.
sentences.cn: 由高中主办的的有效的强制性项目是解决这一严重问题的唯一办法。
